review: this is the first time i have ever enjoyed an atv racing game in my life and this had to be the most fun thirty minutes ive had in so long the soundtrack the atmosphere and the fun this game has would have made me a diehard fan back when i was barely six years old there is no other game like this that could have brought me such a degree of fun out of an atv racer
